title: I Caged By Stranger - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adultery   Affair   Betrayal   Female Protagonist   S*xual Abuse
author: 沐葵
description:
Cheng Songsong was saved by a man in a fire ten years ago, but she thought the man was Ji Mengran who was lying in the hospital ……

Because of the opposition of Ji Mengran’s family, they had a serious car accident on the way to elope, which turned Ji Mengran into a vegetable. She took all the blame and had to suffer humiliation from Ji’s family, living like a poor s*ave!

“Slut, b*tch, you hurt my second brother, and seduced my elderly brother! ” She is framed at the birthday party of Ji’s father, she woke up to find herself in someone else’s bed and took all the blame.

She never imagined that the one who saved her life was the big brother Ji Jingcheng who wanted her to atone for her sins.

...

“Jingcheng, brother, I love Songsong, please let her go. Don’t ever tell her the truth. Don’t ruin my hard-earned happiness, please!” The voice of Mengran suddenly echoed in the mind, Meng Jingcheng hesitated and shopped the kiss to Cheng Songsong. 

But, Meng Jingcheng was scared, he was afraid of losing control of his feeling if he continued to spend time with Songsong……

Tell her, he loves her;
Tell her, the truth about that fire.>
